channel.title: My client wont connect to my server. but my severs fully working and online
channel.description: ive port fowarded correctly and www.canyouseeme.org can see me and on other sites too! but my client wont connect to my server... can anyone help??

item.title: My client wont connect to my server. but my severs fully working and online
item.dc:creator: @Ye_Im_Ace Ye Im Ace
item.description:
@Ye_Im_Ace wrote:

  1. If you hosting on your comp, Use the local host ip… 127.0.0.1
  2. If you server is being hosted on a Virtual private server (VPS) you must use your no-ip or what-ever ip your server is running on, Good luck getting it to work.

Read full topic
